snippet: In “Scattered,” video screened onto a concave structure gives the illusion that the performers are climbing to the top of a waterfall or slipping down it.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews dance-theater work Scattered, performed by British company Motionhouse, at Michael Schimmel Center for the Arts.
lead_paragraph: In “Scattered,” video screened onto a concave structure gives the illusion that the performers are climbing to the top of a waterfall or slipping down it.

headline.seo: Motionhouse at Michael Schimmel Center for the Arts at Pace
headline.main: Like Fish in Waterfalls, Exploring Climate Types
headline.print_headline: Like Fish In Waterfalls, Exploring Climate Types
